level.heading: Recordkeeping and examination.
level.text: ยง 20-203 Recordkeeping and examination. a. A retail dealer shall make and maintain such records of cigarette sales and purchases as are prescribed by the commissioner of finance pursuant to chapter thirteen of title eleven of this code. b. Such records as are required to be kept shall be available for inspection at the place of business for which a retail dealer license is issued and such records shall be available for inspection by the commissioner of finance or such commissioner's duly authorized representatives as to the extent necessary to ascertain whether such retail dealer is in compliance with the purposes and requirements of chapter thirteen of title eleven of this code.
